item.title: Using Dozer Spring Boot Starter
item.description: In this Spring Boot tutorial we will go through step by step guide to creating a Spring Boot console application and configure Dozer Spring Boot Starter library to using Dozer mapping in Spring Boot application. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Creating Spring Boot Console Application Project Open your Spring Tool Suite IDE and choose menu File -> New -> Spring Starter Project In New Spring Starter Project window input below informations for your project and click Next.
